backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the glassmorphism-removal feature to its affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short human-readable summaries of their purpose.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry with OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark design tokens, using a neutral gray-scale palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Home Assist' that mounts the React app into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders only the SplashScreen page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions and identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles defining a light teal-tinted OKLCH design system with a soft gradient splash screen background, decorative blobs, and no glassmorphism effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Splash screen page with a branding header, 'Take Me Home' primary button, SOS emergency button, 'Other Services' button, and a branded footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with Playfair Display/Inter fonts, a custom OKLCH teal color scale, glow shadows, and a fade-up animation.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature definitions for a splash screen app with three buttons ('Take Me Home', 'SOS', 'Other Services') using a clean light background theme. Contains versioned feature IDs, requirements references, and architectural notes.
